page.title: 02FARMING - ARABLE
page.content:
{ Agriculture}is the main industry of the area with no system being particularly dominant.
The agricultural land is fairly evenly divided between{arable and pastoral interspersed with small pockets of deciduous{woodland.
The{arable land}is used predominantly to grow cereals, spring and winter varieties of wheat and barley being the most common. Crops are rotated, therefore the scenery constantly changes.
Farms are{well mechanised, consequently employing only small numbers of people. Those employed have to do a wide variety of jobs on the farm and are{skilled agricultural {workers.
